text: Villiam Vecchi (28 December 1948 â€“ 3 August 2022) was an Italian footballer. He played as a goalkeeper. He was born in Scandiano, Italy. He mainly played for Como 1907 from 1976 until 1981, making 147 appearances. Vecchi died on 3 August 2022 in Reggio Emilia, Italy at the age of 73.Villiam Vecchi morto: portiere del Milan e preparatore con Ancelotti ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian association football goalkeepers Category:Footballers from Emilia-Romagna
title: Villiam Vecchi
